page.title: 18Clubs,Cortachy
page.content: In the Cortachy area girls are more fortunate than boys,as there are both a Brownie Pack and a Guide Company.The Cubs were disbanded this year due to falling numbers and the boys now go to Tannadice.Scouts meet in Tannadice and Kirriemuir but not Cortachy. Many women are members of the S.W.R.I. Young Wives'Group or the Women's Guild,the last two groups being connected with the church.Both men and women are members of Cortachy Curling Club and enjoy curling during the winter.To do this they have to go to Dundee Ice Rink. Keen fishermen are members of Kirriemuir Angling Club and fish the waters of the Prosen and the South Esk.Clay pigeon shooting is another popular sport.
